We are the Berlin Experimental Astronautics Research Student Team e.V. and working on space related projects in our free time. Our work is split up in three workgroups (WG):

* The WG Experimental Rocketry focuses on the development of sounding rockets and an own biliquid propulsion system.

* The WG Science and Experiments develope and build scientific experiments and payloads as well as technology demonstrators. Furthermore the group work on the development of satellite components and missions.

* The WG Robotics developes robotic systems and builds own rover platforms.
